alert.note: Alert for Camas Prairie; Owyhee Mountains; Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands; Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 11 at 5:20AM MST until January 13 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Wind gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Idaho. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous road conditions. Whiteout conditions will cause dangerous travel. Strong winds could cause damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds and blizzard conditions will decrease Saturday morning, but more snow is expected on Saturday resulting in additional travel impacts.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Camas Prairie; Owyhee Mountains; Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands; Western Magic Valley
